NAME: First Aid
DESCRIPTION:
Perform an improvised healing on yourself.
Power: 10

NAME: Small Fireball
DESCRIPTION:
Deal a small amount of fire damage to an enemy.
Power: 10

NAME: Quickflame
DESCRIPTION:
Deal a small amount of fire damage to an enemy. Does not skip the turn.
Power: 18

NAME: Ice Bolt
DESCRIPTION:
Deal ice damage to an enemy and has a chance to freeze them.
Power: 22

NAME: Ignis Ardere
DESCRIPTION:
Conjure severe fire magic damage three times.
Power: 20

NAME: Bloodstealer
DESCRIPTION:
Drain health from your enemy's blood.
Power: 10
